We thank our current directors for their outstanding service to HP and welcome the opportunity to work with our new members. HP's revelation came the same day that another technology heavyweight, Google Inc. , disclosed a surprise reshuffling of its own: CEO Eric Schmidt is relinquishing the job to Google Inc. co-founder Larry Page.

U.S. never found substantial evidence of an active Iraqi program to produce weapons of mass destruction, but Rumsfeld believed that the site near the Iranian border presented the best chance to prove they existed before the war began. For whatever reason, the administration never made public these facts about an active WMD production facility run by terrorists in Iraq, Rumsfeld wrote. He said he made his recommendation to President Bush at a National Security Council meeting Feb. 3, 2003, in which Colin Powell sketched out the presentation he was to make at the U.N. two days later.
